title: Practice Sword
content:
Practice Sword Common 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Though carefully coated in a thick layer of varnish, the edges of the wooden sword are already starting to chip away. Shortsword Light Finesse 0.6 1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Though carefully coated in a thick layer of varnish, the edges of the wooden sword are already starting to chip away.

Shortsword Light Finesse

Practice Sword is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3
